column4: what is the command to install all available updates?  I'd like to be able to update my headless server via ssh
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
Avahi
its a zeroconf sort of thing
that's it!  what's zeroconf?

zero conf is a service discovery... thing.  You can figure out what stuff on your network can do, so you don't have to manually say "I want to find a printer" or in your case "I want to find my music share"
what's the avahi package name?
Its installed by default... but I have no idea.  search for avahi.  probably like avahi-daemon?
i'm on mythbuntu, so a lot of stuff isn't installed by default
you want to link data/video to /media/500gb/vide  so, ln -s /media/500gb/vide data/video
It points to another file

how do i create one?  i'm getting an error in mythweb that reads "could not create symlink to /media/500gb/vide, the local MythVideo dyrectory.  Please create a symlink to your mythvideo directory at data/video
ln is how to make links, -s makes a symlink (soft link).  it's ln -s source dest
thanks.  is data/video an actual directory though? that doesn't make much sense to me
mostly because there's no / before "data"
You're making a symlink to a file, apparently.
so my syntax should read "ln -s data/video /media/500gb" ?  How do I know which is source and which is destination based on that message?
oh I see. okay... that makes much more sense. thanks
We don't support webmin in this channel
oops! my bad.  Is there a webmin channel?
doesn't look like it, at least not on freenode.  http://www.webmin.com/community.html  has a few ways to get in touch though it seems.
okay thanks much!
Is this a new install?  Have you updated since installing? do you have universe enabled?
problem solved! t hank you
